title: Short-term Leasing Available, Dishwasher, Gated Garage Parking
map_address: 7017 South Buffalo Drive near West Badura Avenue
posting_body: 7017 South Buffalo Drive, Las Vegas, NV, 89113
This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1219 Sq.
The Wyatt apartments in the Spring Valley section of Las Vegas, NV are situated in a sophisticated neighborhood near everything you need and want.
Exciting luxuries of the famous Strip are close by, and many places are open day and night.
Take advantage of being a local for even more entertainment opportunities Down Town.
With shopping, diverse restaurants, and plenty of places for relaxation, you will feel right at home and have so much fun living here.
